data.description: Investor Opportunity or Handyman Special* Fix-up with Newer Roof and Newer Vinyl Siding* Spacious 2-level home with 2384 square feet on a nearly 1/4 acre corner HUGE fenced yard with sprinkler system* 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths* Large Living room & Dning room with Archways & Wood Accents + Sunny Country eat-in Kitchen with double corner windows* A/C* Double-Pane Windows* Spacious MudRoom/Laundry/Utility room* Extra Large/Tall 4-car carport and Over-sized 1-car garage/shed* Country Living near the city* NO HOA & LOW TAXES* See broker remarks for terms and info
